title.narrative: 5.1 INTEGRATED APPROACH TO DELIVER CHILD PROTECTION SERVICES

description.narrative: By 2020, government has increased capacity to apply integrated approaches to delivering child protection and social protection services in line with international best practices, which contributes to Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children (Covid), Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 5. By 2020, the most vulnerable girls and boys, increasingly access prevention and response services to address violence, neglect and abuse

title.narrative: By 2020, government has increased capacity to apply integrated approaches to delivering child protection and social protectionservices in line with international best practices

description.narrative: In the reporting period,through;UNICEF;technical support, the;Government increased;its commitment to plan,;develop;and support;social service workforcein the country. This included assessment of existing cadres in social service provision, revision of curricula ofbachelor andmaster’s degreeprogram onsocialwork,developinga four-month social;work;in-service;trainingand professional social work standardsfor service-providers.Key to the success of theUNICEF supportedgovernmentresponse has been the introduction of remote case managementand psychosocial supportduring the restrictive lockdown period. | Status:Met | As-of Date:22/01/2021
